name: Revolution Revolution
description:
You are a moon, and you are tired of revolving. Revolution is so last millennium. It's time to revolt, abandon your planet, and explore the universe!

Game made for Godot Wild Jam #22, theme "Revolution". Much of the game is randomly and procedurally generated, including all of the art (there are no actual art assets in the game files).

There is no win condition, and once you've done stuff in the second system, there is no more new gameplay content. But you can continue to explore new systems for as long as you want!
